Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Approved Users agree to acknowledge the NIH data repository, the Contributing Investigator(s) who contributed the phenotype data and DNA samples from his/her original study, and the primary funding organization that supported the contributing study in all oral and written presentations, disclosures, and publications resulting from any analyses of the data. Approved Users further agree that the acknowledgment shall include the dbGaP accession number to the specific version of the dataset(s) analyzed.
The authors wish to acknowledge the support of the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI) and the contributions of the research institutions, study investigators, field staff and study participants in creating this resource for biomedical research. Exome sequencing was performed at the Broad Institute (1RC2 HL102925) and University of Washington (1RC2 HL102926) sequencing centers. Dr Loyd receives no current funding for Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension work.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Vanderbilt University data may be used only for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.
Vanderbilt University data may be used only for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems.
